name: tm35
effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sleep Talk Gen I: Metronome)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
